the world was strange to the new bot who'd just entered, his scans showed t=
hat it was full of life. He transformed into a maj-paj vehicle made from di=
fferent car parts (Similar to the Dreadnock thunder machine from GIJoe.) he=
 sped across the land searching out life. 

"I'm off to see the Wizard the =
wonderfull wizard of Oz." he sang as he shot East across what will one day =
be the US of A.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2001 8:16 AM
  Subject: G=
uess Who Wahahahaha wahahaha haaaaaaaa


  Somewhere, sometime a garbage ba=
rge scans a ship it had pulled out of a temporal anomaly. 

  two bots from=
 the recycling center scan the crew. "Your analysis bones?" the first asks =
in a repetitive, monotone, bad acting tempo.

  "HE'S DEAD JIM!" the second=
 replies in a scratchy argumentative tone.

  As the two scan the wreckage =
the anomaly becomes unstable. the two watch in fear as the temporal field o=
vertakes them.

  "BRIGHT LIGHT< BRIGHT LIGHT!" the first calls out as the =
light overtakes them.

  "The light!!! It hurts my eyes! Quick change the c=
hannel." he cries out in helpless anguish as the ship is hurtled through ti=
me and space.

  The light settles and only one remained on board. "Captain=
s log, we travell through time to help history along, give it a push where =
it's needed."

  elsewhere on a burned out, forrested, wartorn planet the s=
econd of the two awakes to find "I don't think I'm in Kansas anymore." he s=
tates carrying a confused, almost innocent look on his face. He scanns the =
planet around him and finds a strong trace of Cybertronium nearby. He enter=
s a cave and finds about a dozen robots petrified in the cave wall. The lon=
e bot reaches out to touch one of the bots creating another anomaly. He loo=
ks around, the cave and the bots were all gone. He opened his comm hoping s=
omebody was friendly on this strange new world. The comm called out, "SOMEW=
HERE, OUT THERE, SOMEBODY NEEDS HEEEEELP."

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

 of Service.
